traits.name: Nimble
entries: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The fire eater makes two attacks with its bladed chain.

actions.name: Bladed Chain
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spew Flame {@recharge 4}
entries: The fire eater exhales flames. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
